00049    function getPermissions($roleRef,$getNamedIds=true)
00050    {
00051                 $roleId = $this->getIdFromRef($roleRef);
00052                 if ( ! $roleId )
00053                 {
00054                         $this->raiseError("qx::security::role::getPermissions : invalid role reference '$roleRef'.");
00055                 }
00056 
00057                 if ($getNamedIds === null)
00058                 {
00059                         return $this->db->getAllRows("
00060                                 SELECT
00061                                         p.*
00062                                 FROM 
00063                                         `{$this->permission->table}` as p,
00064                                         `{$this->table_link_roles_permissions}` as l
00065                                 WHERE
00066                                         p.`{$this->permission->key_id}` = l.`{$this->permission->foreignKey}`
00067                                         AND l.`{$this->foreignKey}` = $roleId
00068                         "); 
00069 
00070                 }
00071                 $rows = $this->db->getAllRows("
00072                         SELECT
00073                                 p.`{$this->permission->key_id}` as id,
00074                                 p.`{$this->permission->key_namedId}` as namedId
00075                         FROM 
00076                                 `{$this->permission->table}` as p,
00077                                 `{$this->table_link_roles_permissions}` as l
00078                         WHERE
00079                                 p.`{$this->permission->key_id}` = l.`{$this->permission->foreignKey}`
00080                                 AND l.`{$this->foreignKey}` = $roleId
00081                 ");
00082                 
00083                 $result = array();
00084                 foreach ( $rows as $row )
00085                 {
00086                         $result[] = $getNamedIds ? $row['namedId'] : (int) $row['id'];
00087                 }
00088                 return $result;
00089    }   
00090 
00096    function getByUserId($userId = null)
00097    {
00098                 
00099                 $result = array();
00100                 $sql = "SELECT * FROM {$this->table_link_user_roles} ";
00101                 if ( ! is_null ( $userId ) )
00102                 {
00103                         $userIdList = implode (",", (array) $userId );
00104                         $sql .= "WHERE `{$this->user->foreignKey}` IN ($userIdList)";
00105                 }
00106                 $rows = $this->db->getAllRows($sql);
00107                 foreach ( $rows as $row )
00108                 {
00109                         $userId = $row[$this->user->foreignKey];
00110                         $roleId = $row[$this->foreignKey];
00111                         $result[$userId][] = $roleId; 
00112                 }
00113                 
00114                 return $result;
00115    }
